lines.text: [Jake is inside a tiger's cage, ready to acquire its DNA]
When you acquire its DNA, it'll go into a trance.
What about the moment before the trance when it rips his arm off?

[approaching zoo]
This is where mom works with all the exotic animals.
Exotic... Like weird chickens and stuff?
[Marco complains that he gets all the lame morphs]
Why can't you be the duck for once?
Because I can't afford the bill
You'd better let me handle the jokes.
So now what? Save the world?
